examples: She put her books in her backpack.
He carried a small bag with him.
The shopkeeper gave me a paper bag for my groceries.
Ela colocou seus livros em sua mochila.
Ele carregava um saco pequeno consigo.
O dono da loja me deu um saco de papel para minhas compras.

suggested: She always carries her handbag with her, no matter where she goes.
He filled the sack with groceries and headed back home.
He always takes his backpack with him when he goes on hikes.
She rummaged through her purse for her keys.
She struggled to carry her heavy luggage up the stairs.
She uses her tote bag to carry her laptop and other work essentials.
He always carries his briefcase to work.
